snippet.title: Ceiling Zero Apple II
snippet.description: Ceiling Zero is a well designed, challenging game for the Apple II in which you shoot bouncing objects.  Each level lowers the ceiling, making the playing field more difficult.  As the ceiling lowers, other aspects become more difficult, for example the mother ship releases objects quicker and the special object moves from side to side.
